sourcing.instructions: - Cobalt: Chemical supply companies or online chemical retailers.
steps: - Cobalt: Chemical supply companies or online chemical retailers.
1. Measure and weigh all dry ingredients using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure and weigh all dry ingredients using a precision scale.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable mold that fits the dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a suitable mold that fits the dimensions 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.

steps: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool to room temperature inside the oven for 1 hour.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool to room temperature inside the oven for 1 hour.

steps: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any imperfections.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any imperfections.
